mapper.select: SELECT A.working_part_code , A.employee_code , A.schedule_code , A.working_date , A.working_part_time , A.schedule_code FROM employee_working_part A WHERE A.employee_code = #{employeeCode} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.working_part_code , A.employee_code , A.schedule_code , A.working_date , A.working_part_time , A.schedule_code FROM employee_working_part A JOIN weekly_schedule B ON A.schedule_code = B.schedule_code WHERE B.schedule_code = #{scheduleCode}

SELECT A.working_part_code , A.employee_code , A.schedule_code , A.working_date , A.working_part_time , A.schedule_code FROM employee_working_part A JOIN employee B ON A.employee_code = B.employee_code WHERE B.employee_code = #{employeeCode}
